related.meaning: passing through (a tunnel, station, town, etc.)

idioms.word: 過ちては則ち改むるに憚ること勿れ
idioms.reading: あやまちてはすなわちあらたむるにはばかることなかれ
idioms.meaning: when you make a mistake, don't hesitate to correct it

idioms.word: 過ちて改めざるこれを過ちという
idioms.reading: あやまちてあらためざるこれをあやまちという
idioms.meaning: a man who has committed a mistake and doesn't correct it is committing another mistake

lessons.japanese: 過ちは人の常、許すは神の業。
lessons.english: To err is human, to forgive divine.

lessons.japanese: 我々は自分の犯した過ちを正さなければならない。
lessons.english: We have to put right what we have done wrong.

lessons.japanese: 過去の過ちが迫ってくる。
lessons.english: My past indiscretions are coming back to haunt me.

lessons.japanese: 過ちを改むるにはばかることなかれ。
lessons.english: It's never too late to make amends.

lessons.japanese: 過ちては改むるに憚ることなかれ。
lessons.english: It's never too late to make amends.

lessons.japanese: 過ちのない者は何も作り出せない。
lessons.english: He who makes no mistakes makes nothing.

lessons.japanese: 誰にでも過ちを犯すことがある。
lessons.english: Everyone makes a mistake at times.

lessons.japanese: その事故は運転手の側の過ちから起こった。
lessons.english: The accident was caused by the error on the part of the driver.

lessons.japanese: いかに注意深い人でさえもときどき過ちを犯すことがある。
lessons.english: The most careful man sometimes makes mistakes.

lessons.japanese: まあ、過ちを改めるに遅すぎるということはない。
lessons.english: Well, there's no such thing as being too late to correct one's faults.

lessons.japanese: 母は彼の過ちを許した。
不注意な人間は過ちを犯しがちである。
lessons.english: A careless person is apt to make mistakes.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は重大な過ちを後悔した、反省した。
lessons.english: She showed her regret over the serious mistake.

lessons.japanese: 彼は不注意な過ちをおかす、しかも頻繁にだ。
lessons.english: He makes careless mistakes, and does so frequently.
